author: shazron
msg: Moved navigator.connection (W3C Network Information API) interface under navigator.network.connection.
- This is for consistency reasons with Android because of a WebView bug in 2.2 and 2.3
- Fixed bug in connection.currentNW at startup - it was showing currentNW carrier name if it is a non-cellular connection.

author: shazron
msg: Updated installer notes for latest changes.

author: shazron
msg: Updated Xcode 4 Template to include a reference to CoreTelephony framework (for W3C Network API).
Note this reference is not weak, you must change it to optional to target iOS 3.x if not devices using that OS will crash.
